data.lyric:
[ti:Rumor]
[ar:Lee Brice]
[al:Lee Brice]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rumor - Lee Brice
[00:09.58]Lyrics by：Lee Brice
[00:19.16]Girl you know I've known you forever
[00:22.45]How many nights we hung out together
[00:25.89]Same little crowd little bar little town
[00:29.05]Round this old dance floor
[00:32.64]My boys are laughing and tap me on the shoulder
[00:36.05]Making a motion like
[00:37.35]Could y'all get any closer
[00:39.50]They wanna know what's up why I'm still holding ya
[00:43.05]Even when the song is over
[00:45.57]There's a rumor going round about me and you
[00:52.36]Stirring up our little town the last week or two
[00:59.48]So tell me why we even trying to deny this feeling
[01:02.72]I feel it don't you feel it too
[01:06.01]There's a rumor going round and round and round
[01:09.86]What d'you say we make it true
[01:12.64]We make it true
[01:20.38]Well I can shut 'em down tell them all they're crazy
[01:23.54]I can do whatever you want me to do baby
[01:27.17]Or you could lay one on me right now
[01:29.93]We could really give them something to talk about
[01:33.29]There's a rumor going round about me and you
[01:40.03]Stirring up our little town the last week or two
[01:47.11]So tell me why we even trying to deny this feeling
[01:50.44]I feel it don't you feel it too
[01:53.61]There's a rumor going round and round and round
[01:57.50]What d'you say we make it true baby
[02:13.47]Oh be honest girl now
[02:16.12]Do you want to do this or not
[02:21.37]Should we keep them talking girl
[02:24.43]Or should we just make them stop
[02:27.65]There's a rumor going round about me and you
[02:34.50]Stirring up our little town the last week or two
[02:41.58]So tell me why we even trying to deny this feeling
[02:44.76]I feel it and you feel it too
[02:48.15]There's a rumor going round and round and round
[02:51.87]Whatd'you say we make it
[02:54.89]Make it true
[02:58.85]Whatd'you say we make it true
data.trans:
[ti:Rumor]
[ar:Lee Brice]
[al:Lee Brice]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.58]//
[00:19.16]姑娘 你知道我对你很熟悉
[00:22.45]我们一起度过了多少个夜晚
[00:25.89]同一群人 同一间酒吧 同一个小镇
[00:29.05]在这舞池里转动
[00:32.64]我的哥们哈哈大笑 拍着我的肩膀
[00:36.05]他们好像在问
[00:37.35]你们能再靠近一点吗
[00:39.50]他们想知道咋回事儿 为啥我还抱着你
[00:43.05]明明音乐已经结束了
[00:45.57]大家一直在传我和你的谣言
[00:52.36]在小镇上传得沸沸扬扬 已经持续一两周了
[00:59.48]那我们为何还要否认这种感情呢
[01:02.72]我感受到了 你也感受到了吗
[01:06.01]有个谣言传得沸沸扬扬
[01:09.86]我们真的在一起 怎么样
[01:12.64]真的在一起
[01:20.38]我可以让他们闭嘴 可以告诉他们 他们都是疯子
[01:23.54]你想要我做什么 我都愿意
[01:27.17]或者你可以给我一个机会
[01:29.93]我们可以真的发生点什么 让他们好好瞧瞧
[01:33.29]大家一直在传我和你的谣言
[01:40.03]在小镇上传得沸沸扬扬 已经持续一两周了
[01:47.11]那我们为何还要否认这种感情呢
[01:50.44]我感受到了 你也感受到了吗
[01:53.61]有个谣言传得沸沸扬扬
[01:57.50]我们真的在一起 怎么样 宝贝
[02:13.47]说实话吧 姑娘
[02:16.12]你到底想不想和我在一起
[02:21.37]要让他们继续谈论我们 
[02:24.43]还是想办法阻止他们呢
[02:27.65]大家一直在传我和你的谣言
[02:34.50]在小镇上传得沸沸扬扬 已经持续一两周了
[02:41.58]那我们为何还要否认这种感情呢
[02:44.76]我感受到了 你也感受到了吗
[02:48.15]有个谣言传得沸沸扬扬
[02:51.87]我们真的在一起 
[02:54.89]怎么样
[02:58.85]我们真的在一起 怎么样
